## Install

## How to use

Recordatorio:
- Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope Process
- .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1                               
- pip install ipykernel notebook
- python -m ipykernel install --user --name=venv --display-name "Python 3.13 (venv)"
